entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:21 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:22 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 1:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: E 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing drizzle changing to drizzle or freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:32 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 1:32 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 1:32 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
